attributes.action: No more asylum seekers let into the UK and no benefits for 4 years in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
The UK's population grew by 490,000 in 2014 to around 64.8 million with migrants and asylum seekers accounting for 52% of that figure. Births from migrants and asylum seekers accounted for 47%. With what is happening in Hungary and Calais with an endless flow of migrants this figure will be far higher in 2015. Can our NHS and benefit system take the strain?

Please visit the link below for further information. It is quite alarming!

http://www.migrationwatchuk.org/what-is-the-problem
attributes.background: We cannot take care of our elderly, our ex-servicemen and women and our health service is struggling with our ever expanding population. Does the government really think that we can take care of hundreds of thousands of asylum seekers and migrants?
